member.name: T:Microsoft.AdvocacyPlatform.Contracts.Module
member.summary:
As Azure Functions does not currently have an easy way to support dependency injection (DI), utilizing the method described at https://platform.deloitte.com.au/articles/dependency-injections-on-azure-functions-v2 to provide an DI container to functions.
Base class for modules.

member.param: The collection of services to load.

member.name: T:Microsoft.AdvocacyPlatform.Contracts.IModule
member.summary:
Interface for creating registrable modules for the IContainerBuilder dependency injection container builder
As Azure Functions does not currently have an easy way to support dependency injection (DI), utilizing the method described at https://platform.deloitte.com.au/articles/dependency-injections-on-azure-functions-v2 to provide an DI container to functions.

member.summary: Registers a service with the dependency injection container.

member.summary: Reads data from the data store to a stream.
member.param: The stream to read data to.
The connection string for connecting to the data store.

member.summary: Writes data from a stream to the data store.
member.param: The stream to read data from.
The connection string for connecting to the data store.
The name of the container to write the file.
The relative path (from the container) of the file to write.
Specifies if the container should be created if it does not exist.
member.returns: A Task returning information regarding the newly created file.
